name: Back Break
description:
Relax yourself and fix some backs with this chiropractors simulator.

Game created for GameJam2020 with the theme "repair".

Programmer and original idea:
Javier Alexander Molinaro (@ardikapo)

Design and graphics:
Fabián Marcelo Molinaro (@endy_bocetos)
Gabriel Sebastián Molinaro (@gbrm97)
Javier Alexander Molinaro (@ardikapo)
